description.value:
Trigger A creature moves adjacent to the haunted wall

Effect A powerful force sweeps across the room, shoving all creatures in the room toward the wall. Each creature in the area must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:20] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is pushed 5 feet toward the wall. If the creature would collide with the wall, they take [[/r (1d10+5)[bludgeoning]]] damage.

Failure The creature is pushed 10 feet toward the wall. If the creature would collide with the wall, they take [[/r (2d10+10)[bludgeoning]]] damage.

Critical Failure The creature is pushed 15 feet toward the wall. If the creature would collide with the wall, they take [[/r (3d10+15)[bludgeoning]]] damage and are knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone].

stealth.details: (trained) to feel an ominous presence in the room

details.description: An invisible force bats creatures aside, hurling them into a nearby wall.
details.disable: @Check[type:occultism|dc:19|name:Disperse the Force] (trained) to disperse the force or @Check[type:religion|dc:20|name:Ward yourself from harm] (trained) to ward yourself from harm
